snippet: Richard Lloyd Parry’s “People Who Eat Darkness” revisits the disappearance and murder of a young Englishwoman in Tokyo.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book People Who Eat Darkness: The True Story of a Young Woman Who Vanished From the Streets of Tokyo--and the Evil That Swallowed Her Up by Richard Lloyd Parry.
lead_paragraph: Richard Lloyd Parry’s “People Who Eat Darkness” revisits the disappearance and murder of a young Englishwoman in Tokyo.

headline.seo: ‘People Who Eat Darkness,’ by Richard Lloyd Parry
headline.main: A Dark Tale of Tokyo That Only Gets Darker
headline.print_headline: A Dark Tale of Tokyo That Only Gets Darker
